TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceIDConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 建立可供使用者選取的資料來源名稱清單。

span.span: Creates a user-selectable list of data source names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是通常所參考的物件屬性。The class is a object that is typically referenced by the attribute. 資料來源會傳回名稱方法都是有效的資料來源的元件從指定之內容的容器。The data source names that are returned by the method are of components from the container of the specified context that are valid data sources. 方法會取得值，指出傳回的資料來源名稱可能值的獨占清單。The method gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values. 方法會取得值，指出資料來源名稱，一組標準可從清單中挑選的值。The method gets a value indicating whether the data source names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list. 方法將指定的物件轉換為轉換器的原生類型。The method converts the specified object to the native type of the converter. 方法會取得值，指出是否此可以將指定的來源類型中的物件轉換成原生類型。The method gets a value indicating whether this can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type. 方法會指出指定的元件是否實作介面。The method indicates whether the specified component implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public DataSourceIDConverter ();

Public Sub New ()
public: DataSourceIDConverter();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時所參考類別屬性。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when the class is referenced by a attribute.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能從字串轉換方法所以只會傳回`true`時`sourcetype`是字串。The method can only convert from a string, so the only returns `true` when `sourcetype` is a string. 不會使用`context`參數。The does not use the `context` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`參數具有字串型別，它會傳回為字串。If the `value` parameter has a type of string, it is returned as a string. 如果`value`是`null`，空字串 ("") 會傳回。If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned. 否則會擲回 。Otherwise, a is thrown. 方法未使用`context`或`culture`參數。The method does not use the `context` or `culture` parameter.

param.name: context
param.span: 實作 的物件，提供內容相關資訊給型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，讓型別轉換子執行轉換。

span.span: An object implementing the that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.

summary.span: 傳回可用資料來源名稱的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of the available data source names.

returns.span: ，包含實作 介面且可用於特定內容的控制項名稱。

span.span: A containing the names of the controls that implement the interface and are available for use in the given context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立一份是有效的資料來源所指定的物件容器中的元件名稱`context`參數。The method creates a list of the names of the components that are valid data sources in the container of the object that is specified by the `context` parameter. 然後將轉換至該清單物件。It then converts that list to a object.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您是衍生自類別並覆寫也覆寫方法以傳回的資料來源名稱，獨占清單方法以傳回`true`獨佔資料來源名稱清單時。If you derive a class from the class and override the method to return an exclusive list of data source names, also override the method to return `true` when the data source name list is exclusive. `context`參數不是由。The `context` parameter is not used by the .

Always .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual bool IsValidDataSource (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidDataSource(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function IsValidDataSource (component As IComponent) As Boolean
protected: virtual bool IsValidDataSource(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component);

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

summary.span: 取得值，表示指定的元件是否為有效資料來源。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source.

returns.span: 如果 是有效資料來源則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if is a valid data source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法視為`component`參數是有效的資料來源，如果它實作介面。The method considers the `component` parameter to be a valid data source if it implements the interface.

para.span: 應該覆寫方法，需要進一步調查到指定的元件，以決定是否應該傳回的標準值清單中的控制項。

span.span: The method should be overridden by controls that need to further investigate a given component to decide whether it should be returned in the list of standard values.

para.span: 例如，如果控制項只搭配資料來源，應該傳回僅針對那些元件物件。

span.span: For example, if a control works with only data sources, should return only for those components that are objects.
